body_html: FYI, __setitem__ previously allowed the input and destination to be non-broadcastable, but have the same number of elements. This change makes __setitem__ broadcast the input to the destination like we do with other functions.
body_text: FYI, __setitem__ previously allowed the input and destination to be non-broadcastable, but have the same number of elements. This change makes __setitem__ broadcast the input to the destination like we do with other functions.
body: FYI, `__setitem__` previously allowed the input and destination to be non-broadcastable, but have the same number of elements. This change makes `__setitem__` broadcast the input to the destination like we do with other functions.
